titleStmt.title: The ioiefull and blessed reuniting the two mighty & famous kingdomes, England & Scotland into their ancient name of great Brittaine. By John Bristoll
titleStmt.author: Thornborough, John, 1551-1641.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Ioseph Barnes, & are to be sold in Paules Church yarde at the signe of the Crowne by Simon Waterson [, London,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.

place.placeName: Paules Church yarde at the signe of the Crowne
